title: Popping Pets
description: In Popping Pets, stack and match adorable pets to score points! Connect three or more adjacent pets to clear them before time runs out. Look out for bombs for big clears and big points. Can you reach the highest score in one minute?
instructions: Click pets that are connected with three or more of the same pets to pop them! Find as many matches as fast as possible to score big points! Unlock pet abilities with your earnings to change your strategy and possibly increase your high score!

title: Muscle Up Master
description: The aim of this game that will help you become a muscle master, a boxer or an MMA fighter is to reach the best level! In this adventure where you start with a weak body, start exercising and reach a more muscular body by merging with the characters. As you progress, participate in fighting tournaments and grow faster with the rewards you earn!
instructions: - Select characters and combine them with others. - Level up as you score and join fights when the tournament is ready. - During fights, try to defeat the opponent by clicking on the screen quickly or using the spacebar on the computer.

title: Riot Village
description: Step into Riot Village, a thrilling browser-based adventure where your shooting skills and strategy are tested. Navigate 10 intense levels with AI enemies. Visit the market to choose from 6 unique weapons and equip up to 4 in your inventory. Switch weapons during gameplay to overcome challenges. The game features automatic character movement, letting you focus on aiming and shooting. Adapt your strategy as each enemy wields different weapons. Are you ready for the challenge?
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Stunt Fury
description: Stunt Fury takes adrenaline-fueled stunts to new heights in this action-packed gaming experience. Strap in and prepare to defy gravity as you showcase your skills on a variety of daring platforms. With heart-pounding excitement around every corner, this game challenges players to push the limits of physics and creativity.
instructions: - Use arrow keys and WASD to Drive - Space to Hand Brake

title: Mermaidcore Makeup
description: In Mermaidcore Makeup, you ladies can step into the shoes of a talented makeup artist and work your magic on three stunning ladies. Journey into the realm of fantasy as you help these beauties achieve their perfect, enchanting looks. Prepare for a sensational trip filled with endless options as you explore an extensive selection of hairstyles, eyeshadows, mascara, lipsticks, face patterns, and intricate shoulder and neck patterns that perfectly match each girl's unique style and personality.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game

title: Slope Emoji 2
description: Slope Emoji is a fantastic endless ball rolling game with many emoji balls. Guide a colorful cast of emoji characters down challenging slopes. Test your reflexes with endless series of obstacles, unexpected twists, and surprises. Collect Likes button for more new emoji characters with unique faces! Get ready for the ride of your life and master the art of ball rolling!
instructions: Steer the ball with A/D or Left/Right arrow keys. Get as far as you can and climb up the leaderboard. Avoid all obstacles, bombs, and try to stay on the platform. Falling off the platform or hitting any obstacle and the game is over.

title: Bitball
description: A unique tile ball puzzle game from coin base bitcoin games loved by millions of players around the world. Make a lot of coins and become a rich. ? - Start with 10 and start making millions. ? - Coun you rech the topmillioners.❓ - Play with friend together.? - Guess the ball where it will go.?
instructions: It is that simple as going to school (lol). - On the right sight you will see a lot of buttons. ? - Just click on any one. ?

title: Solitaire Tail
description: Raise your dragons at Solitaire! Clear the game by moving all cards to the foundation! Move cards from the tableau or stockpile in ascending order of the same suit. In the tableau, you can stack cards in descending order with alternating colors! You can place a King card in an empty column! When there are no available moves, you can draw cards from the stockpile to the foundation or tableau!
instructions: Tap or drag to move cards.

title: Merge cubes 2048 3D
description: A completely new approach to the classic game 2048?! Now in 3D and with dynamic physics?! Number cubes don't just merge - they bounce and collide?, adding an element of surprise to every game! Compete with friends or colleagues?!
instructions: 1. At first it will be easy to connect the cubes, but over time there will be more and more of them. Once you connect the biggest cube in this game, it will disappear. If one of the cubes touches the line, you lose and the game starts again. 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the cube. Release your finger or mouse button to let the cube fall onto the field!

title: BFF Lovely Kawaii Outfits
description: Welcome to BFF Lovely Kawaii Outfits game. Princesses Elsa, Anna, Moana, and Jasmine are more fascinated about Kawaii Outfits. They are very eager to browse the new collection of Kawaii outfits. Start helping with each princess for their outfits and matching costumes by browsing their wardrobe. Play these cute girl games and have fun!
instructions: Left mouse button click

title: Cards 2048
description: Are you looking for a fresh twist on a familiar game? Cards 2048 is the perfect blend of classic solitaire and the popular 2048 puzzle game! This unique combination creates an engaging brain teaser that's highly addictive. As you merge cards with matching numbers, the challenge intensifies, offering a true test of your skill and strategy. Sharpen your logic and enjoy hours of fun with Cards 2048, the ultimate card merging game for puzzle enthusiasts!
instructions: In this puzzle game, you should drag the cards to an open slot on the board. When you put two same number cards in a column together, they will be merged. You should challenge yourself and reach 2048! If you can’t merge the numbers and you have no space left to drag the new cards, the game will be over.

title: Chain Cube 2048 3D Merge Game
description: Ready to challenge yourself? Chain Cubes 2048 is an addictive merging puzzle online game for those who like challenging brain teasers and logic puzzle merging games. Believe it or not, it's much harder to put together 2048 cubes than it is to throw away the numbers. If you fail to merge the cube number blocks, they will bounce off each other! Keep playing and eventually complete 2248 number puzzles!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Eat Blobs Simulator
description: The battle of the blobs and slimes is beginning in this great eating simulator. Pick your slime character and start competing against others. Eat smaller blobs and slimes, and make yours bigger than the others. Become the king of the blob arena! Buy various blob skins during the game. On each game, receive various rewards with the blob sizes and coins. Chase smaller blobs and eat them. Collect blobs around and increase your score.
instructions: The game is playable in 1 or 2 players at time. Player 1: W,A,S,D Player 2: ARROW KEYS Common controls: Control the camera by holding RIGHT-CLICK on the MOUSE Control the camera zoom with MOUSE SCROLL Use Joystick controls on mobile devices/tablets.

title: Idle Firefighter 3D
description: Play Idle Firefighter 3D online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Grand Clash Arena
description: Grand Clash Arena is a unique war game that offers an action-packed experience. Key Features of the Game: -Epic Combat Experience: Showcase your mastery against opponents by using every object at your disposal. -Drop Weapons and Surprises: Alter the flow of the game with surprise drops from the sky. Surprise your opponents with powerful weapons that suddenly appear and gain an advantage. Grand Clash Arena offers a unique gaming experience that combines the art of war and strategy.
instructions: Join now, prove yourself in battles! Use WASD keys to move around the arena, spacebar to jump and right mouse button to hit.

title: Magnetic Merge - Number Master
description: Merge numbers by adding tiles with the same number to the field next to already placed tiles (vertically or horizontally). Each merge will create a new tile with a number one higher. Boosters: - Remove any tile from the field; - Remove all tiles with the selected number; - Refresh: allows to change tile form the "NEXT" up to 5 times. Each booster is available only once in a single game. Challenge yourself in this number master merge puzzle. Try to get the higher tile and beet your best score.
instructions: Left mouse click to interact

title: Stunt Rider
description: In this exciting game, you will take on the role of an experienced stuntman, performing daring stunts on your motorcycle at different levels. Unlock new levels and buy cool motorcycles in the Stunt Rider game.
instructions: Control the motorcycle, avoiding overturning, and get to the finish line. Management: Computer: Arrow keys or W, A, S, D to control the motorcycle. Additionally, Left Shift and Right Shift can be used for the gas pedal, and the Space bar can be used for the brake Mobile phone: Use the pedal buttons on the screen to control the motorcycle.

title: GT Cars Mega Ramps
description: Exotic cars, mega ramps, colorful giant bosses and face to face races all come together in this game. GT Cars Mega Ramps invites you to a fantastic driving experience with its completely unique game-play. Fly over mega ramps with your customized exotic car, destroy giant bosses or try to finish the stages first in face to face races!
instructions: If playing single: Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Restart car position: "R" Change camera view: "C" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Restart car position: "R" Change camera view: "C" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "N" Restart car position: "L" Change camera view: "U"

title: Bubiloons
description: Funny, witty, bubbling and very magical… these are the Bubiloons, some cute unicorn animals full of surprises that you will discover in this App.
instructions: Navigate through the app by swiping (touchscreen devices) or clicking (mouse devices) on the screen elements as directed.

title: Hole Battle.io
description: The battle between the holes is beginning in the arena! Pick your hole and join this battle! Eat fruits, planes, cars, and many things that come to mind, and grow as much as you can! Your goal is to eat things that are smaller than you and make your hole bigger than the enemy's. Avoid bigger holes and try to collect power-ups besides eatable items. Four different great maps are waiting for you: - 2048 Map - World Map - Stationary Map - Kitchen Map
instructions: On PC: Move: MOUSE Boost: LEFT-CLICK On Mobile Devices/Tablets: Use Joystick and Boost buttons. Eat smaller items, destroy smaller opponents, and avoid bigger enemies.

title: Insta Trends Galaxy Fashion
description: Embark on a fashionable trip to the center of the Universe with your favorite princesses while playing the Insta Trends: Galaxy Fashion dress-up game for girls. Elsa, Anna, Moana, Ariel, and Rapunzel recently found Planet Her, and they are super excited to share their new home with you. Fashion on this amazing planet is galaxy colored and centered around fashionable suits and out-of-this-world accessories. Discover them all while helping the girls choose their outfits for the day! Have fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: GunFu Stickman 2
description: Armed with a pistol in each hand, take control of the famous Stickman from the "Gun Fu" series and blast through hordes of enemies! Reflexes and reaction times will be challenged and put to the test as the never-ending onslaught gets faster and faster! Unlock more deadly guns and outfits, and customize your Stickman to suit your style!
instructions: Test your reflexes and fire guns in the coolest Stickmen shooting game ever!

title: Dice Merge
description: Dive into Dice Merge Challenges, a game that blends strategic merging with thrilling destruction! Dice Merge Challenges offers intuitive gameplay that's easy to pick up. But as you progress, the challenges become more mind-bending! Combine dice with identical numbers to trigger an explosion creating a new dice with a higher value. Strategically merge your dice to overpower obstacles and shatter every box! Are you ready to become the ultimate Dice Merge Champion?
instructions: Press Space, or Click on the drop button to drop a Dice.

title: Tank Battle.io
description: Players can control the tank to perform various exciting missions and defeat the enemy. Players will have to synthesize a variety of weapons for tanks. There are many tanks in the game that you can choose according to your preference. While completing the task, you must avoid obstacles at any time, and also constantly resist fire from enemy tanks Each level mode has a different difficulty that you can choose from. The higher the level, the higher the stable income received.
instructions: Activate your tank and shoot at the enemy's concentration area, destroying the enemy's armor. Take part in many new real-time challenge modes. Complete tasks of the assigned level and unlock new tanks. As you continue to control the tank, it is necessary to use various gaming skills correctly. Mobile: Control your tank to navigate the map using a virtual joystick PC: Use WSAD to move and click the red icon to shoot

title: Mega Ramp Car Stunts
description: Mega Ramp Car Stunts plays like a hard-core stunt car-driving simulation game. With 3D obstacles on the track, you have a chance to challenge 10 levels in the Stunt Mode and 16 levels in the Giant Ramp mode. Whether you meet checkpoints or not, you need to drive the car to the finish line safely. Don't forget to buy better vehicles in the garage when you have enough green diamonds.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Robots Gone Wild
description: Robots Gone Wild is a thrilling survival game in a sci-fi world with captivating visuals and intense shooting mechanics. Your goal is to escape from rogue robots and destroy them while navigating through hazardous environments. To survive, keep upgrading your character and weapons. Improve your armor, and unlock powerful guns to fend off waves of increasingly powerful robots. Engage in exciting battles, and explore beautiful environments that immerse you in the chaos of a world gone wild.
instructions: One finger control to navigate around attacking robots. Shooting aims automatically at the closest enemy. Keep collecting blue dots and coins to upgrade your character

title: Idle Restaurant Tycoon
description: Do you want to be a unique restaurant manager? You can learn how to be a manager with the Idle Restaurant game. You may need some experts for cooking and serving. Hire a master chef, develop your staff, manage your finances and become the perfect boss. Also, dont forget to check your market for surprise gifts. You can play Idle Restaurant Tycoon in a simple way without the need to constantly click.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mental Hospital Escape
description: Mental Hospital Escape is an exciting hide-and-seek game. In total, it contains two modes, doctor and patient. If you choose a doctor, you need to capture all the patients within the time limit. If you are patient, you need to run as hard as you can in the time limit, climb rocks, dodge chases, and survive!
instructions: Mouse click and drag to move

title: Bubble Race Party
description: Play Bubble Race Party online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Mahjong Magic Islands
description: Play Mahjong Magic Islands online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: L.O.L. Surprise Game Zone
description: Hi, B.B.s, welcome to the big city of L.O.L. Surprise! where you will visit the coolest shops, full of games and surprises.
instructions: PLAY FUN MINIGAMES Explore the shops and buildings in the big city and have fun discovering funny minigames: solve puzzles, shop for you and other B.B.s, decorate the disco, learn other languages, make music, and lots more! COMPETE WITH B.B.s Find the hidden words, test your knowledge about the L.O.L. connecting each BB with her LIL and her pet, win a game at checkers and tic-tac-toe, and try to win at other fun games.

title: My Dreamy Flora Fashion Look
description: Play My Dreamy Flora Fashion Look online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Classic Labyrinth 3d Maze
description: Classic Labyrinth 3d - The wooden maze funny game with the steel ball everyone knows comes to your browser! Enjoy this classic marble maze labyrinth. Features: - Accurate ball physic simulation - Joystick Controler - Smooth ball movement - Personal highscores - 3 Star rating system - One coin per 3 Star finished level - Realistic sounds - Coins to continue, if you fail during the level.
instructions: Use mouse or arrow / wasd keys to move the steelball to the target. Avoid the holes and obstacles. Collect coins by finishing the level as fast as possible. Use the coins to continue after you fell into a hole.

title: TicToc Urban Outfits
description: Your favorite influencers are back, and this time, they are getting ready to have fun and dress up in urban fashion! We've gathered four of our most fashionable BFFs to show you all their hottest looks, so join us in getting started with the TicToc Urban Fashion dress up game for girls, and have a blast choosing their outfit of the day. Experiment with different styles, play with colors and don't forget to use cool accessories for stunning urban looks.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Biking Extreme 3D
description: Do you like riding a mountain bike? Biking Extreme 3D offers you a chance to ride a mountain bike and challenge multiplayer mountain racing tracks. It doesn't matter when you crash any other riders on the track, they will be crashed into the sky. But please always keep a safe distance between your vehicle and obstacles like trees and rocks. Or else, you will lose the game directly. The coins you won are used to upgrade your bike. Don't forget to try another 5 characters!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Candy Match 4
description: The long-awaited sequel to our popular Match 3 game! Candy Match 4 takes you on a delightful journey through the world of delicious candies. With incredible 4000+ levels you will enjoy endless fun combining candies, completing Daily Missions and Challenges, and discovering gifts along the way. Meet your friend Luffy the cat, who helps you navigate through tricky blockers and master the game. Experience one of the best Match 3 games ever!
instructions: Combine more candies of the same kind to get stronger power-ups! Go on an adventure through the beautiful world of candies with 4,120 levels. Help Luffy the cat remove stones and obstacles to collect candies or go treasure hunting. Beware of villains trying to stop you! Enjoy daily missions, challenges, and discover gifts along the way. Experience endless fun in this beautiful Match 3 game!

title: Bubble Blitz Galaxy
description: Welcome to Bubble Blitz Galaxy! Aim and shoot bubbles towards similar ones to collect them while ensuring they stay away from the borderline. Experience two exciting modes: In Arcade Mode, strive to survive as long as possible and score as much as you can. In Challenge Mode, survive and achieve target scores, facing new challenges one after another. Get ready for an exhilarating bubble-blasting adventure!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to aim and shoot bubbles towards similiar ones to collect them while ensuring they stay away from the borderline.

title: Sky Balls 3D
description: Sky Balls 3D invites you on an adventure as you travel through the sky with rolling balls and test your reaction skills. Keep the ball on the track without letting it fall and watch out for obstacles, traps and gaps! Collect coins and keys along the way to get new ball skins and sky-boxes. You can play the game in 1 player and 2 player modes.
instructions: If playing single: Move: "W,A,S,D," or "ARROW KEYS" or "MOUSE" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS"

title: Mermaids Spot The Differences
description: Dive into an enchanting underwater world with "Mermaids: Spot The Differences"! Explore vibrant ocean scenes teeming with mermaids and sea creatures as you sharpen your observation skills to uncover subtle distinctions. Immerse yourself in the magic of the deep blue and embark on an adventure of keen-eyed discovery!
instructions: Click or tap to reveal differences in vibrant underwater scenes starring mermaids and sea life! Sharpen your observation skills and plunge into the oceanic adventure!

title: CityMix Solitaire
description: Play card games, relax and train your memory and brain with CityMix Solitaire. Solitaire CityMix is more than just another game♠♥♠♥! Which would you prefer: decorating and restoring a quiet town, or solving puzzles and seeking adventure on a lost island? With CityMix Solitaire you can decorate, solve puzzles and mysteries, follow adventures and help brave heroes. Vicky and her pet Raccoon will help in this challenging quest.
instructions: Collect cards in the correct order. Complete game tasks. Help the residents of this cozy town and find out their history!

title: Merge Numbers
description: Merge Numbers is a relaxing HTML5 game to play, the objective of the game is to combine two same tile or number into one, then tile number will be upgraded and score will be increased. The game will ended if there is no room or movement available in the board.
instructions: Touch or mouse = Swipe game screen (up, down, left or right) to move tiles Keyboard = Press W,A,S,D to move tiles

title: Emilys Hotel Solitaire
description: What are you going to do when you go on a journey to a tropical island? Will you spend your time in a lounger, enjoying the hot sun and cold drinks, or become a master surfer? Our heroine Emily has arrived at this heavenly place to make her honorable grandfather Douglas Kirby’s dream to build a hotel of his own come true.
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

title: Elemental DressUp Magic
description: Welcome to the fascinating world of natural elements and magic! The main characters of the game are already waiting for you - five beautiful girls representing various elements: fire, water, earth and air. The makeup and outfit of each of these girls is inspired by the element that she represents. The fifth heroine is special. This girl is an Avatar that combines all four elements!
instructions: In this game you will get to know the beautiful representatives of the natural elements, who need your help in creating makeup and attire that personifies their element. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screen is used to control it.

title: Snake Clash
description: Fast-paced and Exciting free-run Snake PvP Gameplay. Play as a snake and collect points to grow longer. Avoid the deadly tiles or use the snake body to break the tiles in your way! But watch out, because the snake will shorten as you use points. Quick decisions are key! Compete with a different opponent in each battle. Grow your snakes, avoid Skull Tiles and collect Battle Points to climb the daily leaderboard and be the One to claim the Snake Clash Crown. Game on!
instructions: Keep growing your snake and destroy as many tiles as possible during 2 minutes to collect the most points. Avoid dangerous tiles. One finger control of the snake: swipe left and right to navigate

title: Funny Fruits: Merge and Gather Watermelon
description: Merge the cheerful fruits, combine them to help them evolve into something even tastier! Hurry to gather more of them to prevent the box from overflowing. Can you collect all the fruits and grow a huge watermelon? Compete with friends for higher scores!
instructions: CONTROLS: Use the mouse to move fruits. Click on the game field to release a fruit. GAME RULES: When two fruits of the same type touch, they merge into a larger fruit of the next level. If the fruits overflow the box, the game ends.

title: Turbo Trucks Race
description: Turbo Truck Race, an intense racing game with diverse trucks, unique abilities, and action-packed modes. Experience the adrenaline with realistic graphics, strategic gameplay, and the freedom to explore different landscapes in FreeMap mode. Turbo Truck Race brings a new level of excitement with powerful trucks!
instructions: Player 1 Movement: WASD or arrow keys. Nitro: Left Shift To connect the trailer: T Camera: C Player 2 Movement: arrow keys Nitro: Right Shift To connect the trailer: K Camera: M

title: Merge in Space
description: Merge in Space is a cosmic twist on the classic Tetris formula, where you must strategically merge falling astronomical objects of the same kind as they descend through the infinite void of space
instructions: Tap or click to drop the object

title: Sunny Link
description: 'Sunny Link' is an easy and fun game where players match tiles with summer icons. The goal is to connect two identical tiles. Tiles can be linked if you can join them with three or fewer straight lines. The game has many levels to enjoy. As you play, you’ll hear sounds of the sea. It’s perfect for relaxing and having fun in the sun!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Girl Coloring Dress Up Games
description: Brand new girl games are already waiting for you! Start creating your own coloring pages by dressing up dolls and painting pictures for backgrounds. You’ll get hundreds of color options, textures and patterns, glitter and gradients. Create your coloring book from scratch, color dresses, and improve your clothes designer skills. If you like drawing that’s the free coloring apps you’ve been looking for! ?️Creative Coloring Games for Girls? ✪ Play as a doll designer: select hair, dress up, and pick accessories ✪ Design clothes: use gradients, textures, and patterns ✪ Combine stylish looks and haircuts like in famous girl games ✪ Color without numbers and paint with glitter ✪ Create coloring pages: move and change dolls and backgrounds ✪ Zoom in and out for better results ✪ Makeover dolls and backgrounds ✪ Paint wallpaper for your phone in fun color games ✪ Take pictures right in the game and share them with friends easily ✪ Free coloring book offline with many options
instructions: Use left mouse click to change outfit.

title: Solitaire Farm Seasons 3
description: Solitaire Farm: Seasons 3, the highly anticipated sequel, continues the charming farm theme of Seasons 1 and 2 with incredible 3,400+ levels! Train your brain with diverse solitaire puzzles while enjoying country life. Explore new scenes and travel to new countries. Grow new crops such as Gooseberry, Foxgloves, Celery, Papyrus, Loquat, Prickly Pears, Berseem, and Blackberries. Enjoy stunning visuals and engaging gameplay in this delightful solitaire adventure!
instructions: Move cards one point higher or lower than the discard stack, clearing cards to reveal new ones. If stuck, draw from the spare stack. Between levels, manage your farm: plant crops, harvest for coins, unlock features, complete daily missions, spin the Wheel of Fortune, and customize your farmhouse. Return daily for rewards!
